data.title: Terrible service!
data.text: This place was seriously awful. I have no idea why it is even rated a 39 out of 75 restaurants, which is not a very good score to begin with, but it was where I was shopping, so I gave it a shot. My lunch visit which was around 1:30pm started off well. I was seated in the bar area at a booth, by the friendly hostess. Guessing so the bartender could be my waitress, as there was no one else in the bar area, and only 2 other tables taken in the rest of this place. That person disappeared and I ordered the chicken Caesar wrap and fries when I got waited on. It was downhill from there. My food was brought out by someone else, and my waitress who was the bartender never checked on me, I had to flag down someone else who walked by to get ketchup, and yet another person to get a sofa refill. I want to be very clear here- I sat a total of 20 minutes AFTER I got my food without her checking on me, and only one other person came in and sat at the bar. She was oblivious. I had to ask someone walking by for my bill. When that person went to her with my request for the bill she came back all 'sing songy' of course because it was tip time. The fries were good, but the sandwich was tasteless. I highly recommend you go ELSEWHERE!

data.title: Great food
data.text: We went for happy hour and had some great apps. good prices and a really nice bartenders. We will go back.

data.title: Great place to have a good meal
data.text:
Traveling around Woodbury is a good place to eat, no matter if you want appetizer or a meal, they do have options.
The people are very friendly and try to give you the best service

data.title: Kid Friendly place
data.text: Great go to spot when Grandpa and Grandma are in town... Very kid friendly. Wonton Tacos are amazing!

data.title: Good food and service at a fair price
data.text: We had a late evening dinner at this restaurant as others in the area were already closed. Friendly staff, good food and fair price. I tried the Summit Brewing IPA and found it an excellent tap beer. The have a happy hour in the normal hours for one but also have a happy hour after 9:00 pm which I found interesting.

data.title: Well Lah Tee Dah
data.text: Working in a restaurant myself, I hate having bad service from the waitstaff at other establishments. I hope our waitress was having a bad day becuase of she is always like this, thats a problem. This is the first time I had been to this location.  My mom and I were out in the area and decided to go here, what a dissapointment. The food we had from the pick 2 for 25 menu was above average. Would I go back here? Never again, just turned me and anyone reading this away.

data.title: Inconsistent Wait Staff
data.text: Wait staff slow in responding to our table after we were seated, slow to take our order, and nearly forgotten after we received our order. This happened more than once over the last 3 visits. We live in Woodbury and frequent our cities local chain restaurants.

data.title: Dinner for three
data.text:
We ordered the Fiesta Lime Chicken for two with an appetizer that is $25.00....this special use to be $20.00.  This meal is always excellent!  I also had a hot fudge Sunday shooter for 2.49.  I would have preferred the smaller shooter they use to have for a dollar.  Granted ths one is just as good but bigger - I liked the smaller, less expensive one especially since restaurant prices have increased so much.

The atmosphere is your typical family restaurant setting.

data.title: Just Drink
data.text: It's ok for drinking cold beers to chill out. I didn't like nachos and shrimp fries. they were too oily. Burger was ok. They have different types of draft beers.

data.title: A truly great place
data.text: The food and service that i get everytime I visit is perfect! I haven't had one problem with this place since I started going when it opened!

data.title: always wonderful service!
data.text: We go here a few times a month. we always sit at the bar and get wonderful service from the 3 bartenders there. the older lady with the glasses i forget her name is always wonderful! great service, good drinks and wonderful happy hour prices! will continue to visit!

data.title: Late lunch
data.text:
After a strenuous morning shopping with my wife, I ended to get a quick lunch.
Found this Applebee's just around the corner. These restaurants are always very clean.
Food consistently good, and service prompt.

data.title: Applebee's Woodbury
data.text: Changed the menu again. Got rid of my one thing I like to get there. Server was very good and understanding of my frustration.

data.title: Typical Applebees
data.text: We go to Applebees just about once a month. It is hit or miss every time we go there.  A lot has to do with the staff. Sometimes our food comes out fresh and hot, and other times it seems you can certainly tell that it has been sitting around for awhile.  It seems like over the last couple years their portions on the appetizers seems to shrink.  Also, they do change their menu from time to time.  That is not necessarily a good thing.  For convenience, we go to Applebees, not because it is great food.

data.title: Not worth the time or money
data.text: Not impresses. Service was somewhat delayed though there server was very nice. the food was not good, I did not finish the pasta dish I ordered as it simply tasted bad. There are so many other choices in the area, I would go to anyone of them before this. There is another Applebee's in Woodbury that is so much better, I am surprised by the lack of consistency between the two. I would not spend the money here

data.title: Fake steak
data.text:
I've had steak at Applebee's before and it was not the greatest. But last night I had the sirloin and it had the taste and texture of highly processed meat. It reminded me of a chicken nugget, finely ground and then molded into a steak shape. It cut with a fork and almost fell apart without even chewing it. My son also had a steak and his was exactly the same. If it hadn't been "car-side to go" I would've returned it and refused payment. The Mc'ds drive thru would've been better, at least I know I'm buying fake crap food there and I'm not paying more for it. 

I will never go to Applebee's again.

data.title: Very good food and a lot of variation in food.
data.text: You are very well looked after there..... and prices are very reasonable for the amount of food you get!

data.title: Caring staff
data.text: I know this is a chain restaurant, but I have to tell you about the great staff here. I brought my 90 year old Dad here to meet his wife for lunch. He is in a memory care center and I transported him by wheelchair. He is on a mechanical soft diet due to swallowing difficulties. Our waitress recognized them from the time before when they were there last. She helped us pick out something appropriate for him to eat. Everyone was attentive and helpful. And my dad ate more than he has for a long time!

data.title: No Way and had e-coli outbreak the week we were there!
data.text:
Took my 3 sons here for lunch at 11:00 and was disappointed how long it took our server to come out.  Applebee's keep trying to change their menu and it seem the effort is to put let on the plate and to use smaller rectangular plates.  Having an 18, 15 and 12 year old son they like fries.  Given that the chains give you fries with almost any plate it's generally a no-brainer.  The few fries the put on the plate was ridiculous.   There were fewer than what you get in a small McDonalds fry...but not nearly as good.  

Ironically, this location had an e-coil problem over the days we were there that came out afterward.  It was apparently with their Asian chicken salad...but they blamed a supplier (of course).  The guy who got sick is suing!  Good for him.

What is reinforces is that this is a chain who is told what to serve, how to prepare (er - assemble)the food and how little to plate in order to cheap the customer to make more money per diner vs make customers happy so they return. 

There are plenty of other chains - won't be back again to this or other Applebee's unless I'm desperate or want to lose 20 pounds by getting violently ill!

data.title: The only good thing was the service
data.text:
We called in for a pitstop here after a hard day's shopping. Unfortunately the quality of the food was very poor and I would certainly not go here again. Very mediocre, cheap ingredients. The wings were ok but the fish was too greasy and the chips like potato mush.

Also, I must point out the wine was not good at all and the cocktails were so weak and tasted like they were synthetic.

They get 3 stars because the service was excellent. The Greeter was very friendly and our waiter could not have been more helpful. However, I wouldn't go back.
